snippet: As the trial of George Zimmerman begins in Sanford, Fla., Chief Cecil Smith continues to tackle a hurdle: easing tensions between black residents and his police department.
abstract: Cecil E Smith, new police chief in Sanford, Fla, is working to ease tensions between community's black residents and police department; fatal shooting of black teenager Trayvon Martin by volunteer neighborhood watchman George Zimmerman put spotlight on town that many residents describe as divided along racial lines.
lead_paragraph: As the trial of George Zimmerman begins in Sanford, Fla., Chief Cecil Smith continues to tackle a hurdle: easing tensions between black residents and his police department.

headline.main: Police Chief in Florida Tries to Ease Old Tensions
headline.print_headline: Police Chief In Florida Tries to Ease Old Tensions
